conversation.message: That is a crucial question, Parent_B, and we appreciate you raising it. We understand that the transition period is vital for both the child and the family. Our process is highly structured yet flexible: it begins with a personalized 'Staggered Start' approach, where new students are introduced to the environment gradually over the first week, often starting with shorter sessions accompanied by a parent/guardian. We assign a dedicated 'Settling-In Buddy' teacher who focuses solely on your child during this time. Communication is paramount; parents receive daily detailed feedback and photographs during the initial weeks via our secure app, and we schedule a mandatory check-in meeting with the lead teacher at the end of the second week to ensure comfort and successful integration. Our goal is always a smooth, happy transition for everyone involved.
